description:
Every day, thousands of companies all over the world depend on Flow to manage projects and keep track of what they need to get done. Delegate tasks, have discussions, and store all your important files in one place, easily accessible to your whole team from the web, smartphone, or tablet.

Reviews:

"The app feels slick. It isn’t overly complex so it’s pretty easy to get started." — TechCrunch

"This is the closest thing I’ve seen to my ideal task management setup." — John Gruber

"It’s not often you come across an app as slick as Flow for productivity...Its gorgeous UI compliments the goal it aims to solve." — The Next Web

Flow is free to use with one other person. Larger plans start at:

- Studio ($29/mo USD): 5 People / 2 Workspaces / 5 GB Storage
- Team ($49/mo USD): 10 People / 5 Workspaces / 10 GB Storage
- Business ($129/mo USD): 25 People / 10 Workspaces / 30 GB Storage
- Corporate ($249/mo USD): 50 People / 15 Workspaces / 60 GB Storage

All paid plans are billed monthly and renew automatically. Privacy policy and terms of service can be found at http://www.getflow.com/tos 

Subscription Service Conditions:

 • Your iTunes account will be charged at confirmation of your purchase and auto-renews for the same price and duration period as the original purchased package
• Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
 • Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period 
• You can manage your subscription and switch off the auto-renewal by accessing your Account Settings after purchase 
• You cannot cancel the current subscription during the active subscription period
releaseNotes:
This is a stopgap release to address a few user issues caused by iOS 8. We felt it was important to release this build immediately instead of waiting until the next feature release. A major release (including 6+ support) is in the works and will be coming very shortly after this one. 

Thanks for your bug reports that helped us track down these user issues.  If you have an outstanding issue that hasn't been reported, please get in touch with our speedy support staff: support@getflow.com

Happy Flowing, 
<3 the Flow team
